item.title: NATO jets deployed to 'monitor' Russian drone attack in Ukraine, Romania says
item.description: Two German fighter jets were scrambled to the Romanian-Ukrainian border on Tuesday night in response to a Russian drone attack in the frontier region.

item.title: WATCH: Driver smashes through window as food influencers film restaurant review
item.description: A pair of food influencers escaped without major injuries after a driver accidentally plowed through a restaurant in Houston over the weekend.
